item.title: Make it Stand - Balancing Shapes for 3D-printing
item.description: Through the evolution of 3D-printers, the it has become more and more easy to produce prototypes of 3 dimensional shapes. In this project we developed our first software to produce shapes and printable objects for a 3D-printer. This project was part as a final project of the Ã‰cole Polytechnique course X-INF 574 Digital Representations and Analysis of Shapes
